snippet.title: RailGods of Hysterra - First Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3201910?utm_source=firstgameplay&utm_campaign=announcement&utm_medium=youtube 
Railgods of Hysterra is a Lovecraftian Survival Base-building Action Game. 

Venture alone or team up with allies online as you traverse a wicked landscape plagued by Lovecraftian horrors. Command, evolve, and live in symbiosis with a colossal RailGod, a nightmarish creature entangled with a locomotive, and expand your base—the train. Craft weapons, harness dark magic, gain eldritch powers, and upgrade your Carriages to withstand the relentless onslaught of monsters and cultists. Stop to explore cursed areas, fight, capture, and sacrifice your foes, and prepare for the battles that lie ahead. 

In a world where madness reigns, only the strongest will survive. Will you rise to overthrow the Great Old Ones?

Join our Discord and sign up for upcomming playtest: https://discord.gg/railgodsofhysterra 
More information at our website: https://railgodsofhysterra.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=Announcement_ROH&utm_id=roh_oct 

Join our community:
X (Twitter): https://x.com/RailGodsGame 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/railgodsofhysterra
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/railgodsofhysterra

Railgods of Hysterra is made by developer Troglobytes Games, published by Digital Vortex Entertainment.
